p.9: o Need to be able to write production quality code, tests, and documentation
p.10: o Experience managing a deployed predictive model a plus but not required (logging, debugging, monitoring)
p.11: o Experience with automation (ex. Airflow) a plus but not required
p.12: 2. Within a North American time zone
p.13: 3. Experience with collaborative development best practices (GitHub, Bitbucket, etc.)
p.14: o CI/CD experience a plus but not required
p.15: 4. Strong statistical modelling skills (distinct from machine learning)
p.16: o Mastery of linear regression with quadratic and interaction terms required
p.17: o Experience with Bayesian/ probabilistic methods a plus but not required
p.18: o Principle components analysis/ clustering / binary classification experience a plus but not required
p.19: 5. Mastery of data manipulation languages: pandas required, SQL a strong plus
p.20: 6. Experience developing on Linux based systems a plus but not required if they are willing to learn
p.21: 7. Knowledge of mining/ minerology/ physics nice-to-have but certainly not required
p.22: 8. Experience in computer vision using hyperspectral unmixing an extremely nice-to-have but probably not going to happen
p.24: Interested candidates can share the resumes to srini@pronixinc.com or reach me @ 609-297-5966
